Name: Huckleberry (PH)
SeedDescription: Plant these in the fall. Takes 7 days to mature into a huckleberry bush. Continues to produce after the first harvest, yielding multiple berries per harvest.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plant these in the fall. Takes 7 days to mature into a huckleberry bush. Continues to produce after the first harvest, yielding multiple berries per harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: Plant these in the fall. Takes 7 days to mature into a huckleberry bush. Continues to produce after the first harvest, yielding multiple berries per harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanze sie im Herbst. Wächst in 7 Tagen zu einem Heidelbeerenbusch heran, kann aber danach mehrmals geerntet werden. Bringt mehrere Heidelbeeren pro Ernte ein.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: Plant these in the fall. Takes 7 days to mature into a huckleberry bush. Continues to produce after the first harvest, yielding multiple berries per harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.hu: Plant these in the fall. Takes 7 days to mature into a huckleberry bush. Continues to produce after the first harvest, yielding multiple berries per harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.it: Plant these in the fall. Takes 7 days to mature into a huckleberry bush. Continues to produce after the first harvest, yielding multiple berries per harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: Plant these in the fall. Takes 7 days to mature into a huckleberry bush. Continues to produce after the first harvest, yielding multiple berries per harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plant these in the fall. Takes 7 days to mature into a huckleberry bush. Continues to produce after the first harvest, yielding multiple berries per harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Сажайте осенью. Вырастает через 7 дней и продолжает давать урожай после первого сбора.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.tr: Plant these in the fall. Takes 7 days to mature into a huckleberry bush. Continues to produce after the first harvest, yielding multiple berries per harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 秋天种植。需要7天才能长成蔓越橘丛。在第一次收获后继续结果。一次收获多个浆果。
